## AppRegister.deregisterRoute() method

API for developers to deregister [AppRoutes](./foundation-shell.approute.md).

**Signature:**

```typescript
deregisterRoute(route: AppRoute): void;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  route | [AppRoute](./foundation-shell.approute.md) | The [AppRoute](./foundation-shell.approute.md) to deregister. |

**Returns:**

void

## Example


```ts
getApp().deregisterRoute(someAppRoute);
```
